name: Sage Solitaire Poker
description:
Sage Solitaire Poker is an addictive mashup of well-known mechanics of Solitaire and depth of Poker.


The game starts with 3x3 grid of card stacks. Your goal is to clear the board of cards by making hands: pairs, straights, flushes - everything you know from Poker, and more! To get familiar with the rules of Sage Solitaire Poker, check out the in-game rules and screenshots.


You are more than welcome to share your thoughts on what you would like to see in game to make it even more fun. Thanks!

Enjoy!
